query:
SELECT
                        COUNT(s.mission) as play_count,
                        m.id,
                        m.name,
                        m.summary,
                        m.briefing,
                        m.type as "typ: MissionType"
                    FROM missions m
                    LEFT JOIN missions_schedule s
                        ON s.mission = m.id
                    WHERE
                        archived = FALSE AND
                        (
                            LOWER(m.name) LIKE LOWER($1) OR
                            LOWER(m.id) LIKE LOWER($1)
                        )
                    GROUP BY m.id
                    ORDER BY m.name ASC
